content.html: This is why I didn't speak there. It was huge yet weirdly anonymous. I couldn't really articulate it beyond "bad vibes", so I didn't warn others. I didn't predict the stuff around speaker fees & streaming, but just had a strong feeling it wasn't the kind of conference I'd enjoy.
